mdx.excerpt: Welcome to LifeCast. There is no government... There is no law… There is no choice... There is only the Idol. Extreme urban sprawl has resulted in one massive…

frontmatter.title: Welcome To Lifecast
frontmatter.description: BRAVE NEW WORLD  meets FEED  in this thrilling adventure that pits one man against a pleasure-obsessed society that threatens to take everything from him.
